io.spine.server.enrich

Class Enricher<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends io.spine.core.EnrichableMessageContext>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.enrich.Enricher<M,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnrichmentService<M,C>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EventEnricher

    public abstract class Enricher<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends io.spine.core.EnrichableMessageContext>
extends java.lang.Object
implements EnrichmentService<M,C>
    Enriches messages after they are stored, and before they are dispatched.

    • Method Detail

      • enrich

        public <E extends EnrichableMessageEnvelope<?,?,M,C,E>> E enrich(E source)
        Enriches the passed message if it can be enriched. Otherwise, returns the passed instance. A message can be enriched if the flag do_not_enrich is not set in the Enrichment instance of the context of the outer object of the message.
        Parameters:
        source - the envelope with the source message
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed message cannot be enriched

      • createEnrichment

        public java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.Enrichment> createEnrichment(M message,
                                                                     C context)
        Description copied from interface: EnrichmentService
        Creates an enrichment for the passed message.
        Specified by:
        createEnrichment in interface EnrichmentService<M extends com.google.protobuf.Message,C extends io.spine.core.EnrichableMessageContext>
        Parameters:
        message - the enrichable message
        context - the context of the enrichable message
        Returns:
        an instance with all available enrichments for the passed message, or empty Optional if the passed message cannot be enriched
